Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-27144 affecting package dcos-cli for versions less than 1.2.0-17
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-27144 affecting package dcos-cli for versions less than 1.2.0-17. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package dcos-cli is earlier than 1.2.0-17, affected by CVE-2025-27144
